Device
public class ServerDevice
extends DeviceAbsImpl

A server device that receives a connection from a remote device. Generally this device is the TV device.

2012-06-13

Matthew Patience

Method Detail

connect

public void connect()
             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: Device
This method will either make a connection to a socket or listen on a socket, depending on the device type. The method will throw an IllegalStateException if the device IP address is not set before calling this method.

Throws:
java.net.UnknownHostException
java.io.IOException
